title: First Race, First Win: Caleb Ewan Kicks to Validatory Victory on Debut with Ineos Grenadiers
content:
'No better way to start': Aussie speedster provides payoff at Coppi e Bartali after his new team bet on him with a late-hour, career-saving deal.

Read the full article at First Race, First Win: Caleb Ewan Kicks to Validatory Victory on Debut with Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
